Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks in the area of Kedzie. Service is resuming

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks in the area of Kedzie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
